H0.text: what river is associated with the city of rome. Arno

H2.text: what river is associated with the city of rome. Adige

H3.text: what river is associated with the city of rome. Tiber

A4.text: The Tiber has achieved lasting fame as the main watercourse of the city of Rome, which was founded on its eastern banks.

A5.text: The river rises at Mount Fumaiolo in Central Italy and flows in a generally southerly direction past Perugia and Rome to meet the sea at Ostia.
